goals.active: Use the Searing Cauldron against Zhaitan's horde.
goals.complete: I took part in the mission to airlift the Searing Cauldron into Orr and fire it off against Zhaitan's army. The mission was a success, but only due to the bravery and sacrifice of our pilot, Arda Gyreshriek. Arda went missing after the blast, so Laranthir of the Wild and I set out to find her and bring her home safely.

goals.active: Locate Arda Gyreshriek on Winterknell Isle.
goals.complete: We found Arda amid the wreckage of her airship, but the Risen had gotten to her first. I'm glad we had the chance to tell her that the mission succeeded before she died. We have little time to mourn her loss; the invasion of Orr is far from over. Laranthir promised to add Arda's name to the roster of honored dead while I returned to Trahearne for my next mission.
